bill.title: PUPPERS Act of 2019 Preventing Unkind and Painful Procedures and Experiments on Respected Species Act of 2019
bill.description: Prohibits the Department of Veterans Affairs, in carrying out research within the Veterans Health Administration, from purchasing, breeding, transporting, housing, feeding, maintaining, disposing of, or experimenting on dogs as part of the conduct of any study that causes significant pain or distress.

history.action: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
